Title: Branding
Branding_Para1: Flashpoint's logo was designed in 2020 by project contributor Seirade. It is licensed under $1{Creative Commons Attribution 4.0}, which means it can be freely modified and distributed as long as Seirade and/or Flashpoint receive credit.
Branding_Para2: The logo is an abstraction of the initials "FP", featuring an arrow shape that can be interpreted as a play button or download symbol. It is usually imposed on top of a gradient travelling downward and rightward from $1{#e81c24} to $2{#7c1315}, although this gradient can also be used to color the logo itself. The wordmark uses the Tahoma font.
